Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, chain lightning, fireball, ice storm, magic missile, shatter, wall of force

sections.body:
This smooth hickory or yew staff allows use of the following spells:

  • Fireball (1 charge)
  • Magic missile (1 charge)
  • Shatter (1 charge)
  • Ice storm (2 charges)
  • Wall of force (2 charges)
  • Chain lightning (3 charges)
sections.name: Description
